Uses of Interface
org.jfree.chart.entity.EntityCollection

  • Packages that use EntityCollection 
    Package Description
    org.jfree.chart
    Core classes, including JFreeChart and ChartPanel.
    org.jfree.chart.block
    Blocks and layout classes used extensively by the LegendTitle class.
    org.jfree.chart.entity
    Classes representing components of (or entities in) a chart.
    org.jfree.chart.renderer
    Core support for the plug-in renderers used by the org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlot and org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot classes.

    • Uses of EntityCollection in org.jfree.chart.renderer

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityCollection RendererState.getEntityCollection()
